name: Thwackey
description: The faster a Thwackey can beat out a rhythm with its two sticks, the more respect it wins from its peers.

attacks.name: Taunt
attacks.effect: Switch 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Double Hit
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 60 damage for each heads.
